content:
Dear all,

at Cognitive Systems of the University of Bamberg (Germany) we have one open research assistant position in Explainable Machine Learning especially Inductive Logic Programming . Additional Information

Starting Date: as soon as possible
Appl. Deadline: 2019-09-24 (or until position filled)

Kind regards,
Michael Siebershttps://claire.zulipchat.com/user_uploads/13862/N3sUV3gJtsvdbtzgVmbzjtuw/Tendering_Dare2Del_date.pdf
